Lai sasniegtu sapni par bagātību, laimes meklētāji pat gatavi riskēt ar saviem ietaupījumiem!

programme.title: Noliktavu kari 11
programme.desc: Ja Kalifornijas štatā, ASV, par mantu glabātuvi netiek maksāts trīs mēnešus, noliktavas īpašnieks tā saturu drīkst izpārdot izsolē. Šovs seko vairākiem šādu izsoļu dalībniekiem, kur ar to nodarbojas profesionāli. Pirms katras izsoles tiek atvērta mantu glabātuve, un potenciālie pircēji piecas minūtes var aplūkot to saturu, taču viņi nedrīkst iet iekšā, lai apskatītos tuvāk, vai glabātuvē esošajās mantās ir kas vērtīgs. Kad izsole ir galā, uzvarētājs izpēta, ko tieši ir iegādājies un ar ekspertu palīdzību nosaka katras lietas vērtību, lai saprastu – šis pirkums ir nesis peļņu vai zaudējumus un cik lielus.

programme.title: Virsotne. Jaunzēlande
programme.desc: Aizraujošas izturības sacīkstes, kur fiziskās un emocionālās robežas tiek pārbaudītas līdz lūzuma punktam. Piedzīvojumā dodas 14 svešinieki, kuriem ir viens mērķis – sasniegt kalna virsotni. Starp dalībniekiem vienādās daļās ir sadalīts miljons dolāru, ko katrs šai pārgājienā nes sev līdzi mugursomā. Grupai ir jāsasniedz attāla kalna virsotne tikai 14 dienās, lai iegūtu līdzi paņemto naudu. Pārgājiena laikā viņiem būs jāstrādā kā komandai, pārvarot bīstamu reljefu, skarbus laikapstākļus un adrenalīna pilnus izaicinājumus. Ja pārgājiena dalībnieks izstājas, jāatvadās arī no viņa mugursomā esošās naudas. Dalībniekiem laikus jāsasniedz virsotne, citādi naudas balva tiks zaudēta. Ceļā viņus gaida nežēlīgi pavērsieni – arī iespēja nozagt cita dalībnieka naudu. Vai viņi sasniegs virsotni laikā un kurš dosies prom ar naudu?

programme.title: Kovboji un citplanētieši
programme.desc: Grāvējfilmu režisors Džons Favro, aktieri Daniels Kreigs un Harisons Fords kopā ar producentiem Stīvenu Spīlbergu, Braianu Greizeru un Ronu Hovardu piedāvā asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filmu, kurā Mežonīgie rietumi sastapsies ar vēl nepieredzētu pretspēku. Un tas nebūs no šīs pasaules. 1873. gads, Arizona. Svešinieks, kurš neatceras, kas ar viņu noticis pagātnē, ierodas kādā pilsētiņā. Viņam ap roku ir noslēpumaina aproce – tā ir vienīgā norāde uz viņa neparasto pagātni. Viņš atklāj, ka šejienieši nav no viesmīlīgākajiem ļautiņiem, un katru viņu soli nosaka pulkvedis Dolarhaids un viņa cietā dūre. Ikviens šajā pilsētiņā dzīvo bailēs.

programme.title: Rokijs 3
programme.desc: Pēc neskaitāmām uzvarām boksa ringā, Rokijs bauda čempiona slavas augļus un atvelk elpu, cīnoties ar viegli uzveicamiem pretiniekiem. Kad viņu ringā izaicina Langs, uz spēles ir likts Rokija čempiona tituls. Rokijs ir sadraudzējies ar bijušo boksa čempionu Apollo, kurš kļūst par viņa vienīgo atbalstu pēc kāda sāpīga zaudējuma.

programme.title: Patagonija. Dzīve pasaules malā
programme.desc: Patagonija – viena no unikālākajām vietām uz Zemes, kur augsne ir neauglīga, bet jūra ir dzīvības bagāta. Izmantojot zemūdens kameras, helikopterus, dronus un GoPro kameras, vesela gada garumā filmēšanas komanda iemūžinājusi unikālus kadrus ar retiem dzīvniekiem, kādus nereti nav iespējams sastapt nekur citur. Dokumentālās filmu sērijas veidotāji stājās pretī ekstremāliem laikapstākļiem, izsalkušiem plēsējiem, vētrainām jūrām, stāviem kalniem un saules svelmei, lai atklātu mežonīgās un nepieradināmās Patagonijas dabas dārgumus.

programme.title: Patagonija. Dzīve pasaules malā
programme.desc: Patagonija – viena no unikālākajām vietām uz Zemes, kur augsne ir neauglīga, bet jūra ir dzīvības bagāta. Izmantojot zemūdens kameras, helikopterus, dronus un GoPro kameras, vesela gada garumā filmēšanas komanda iemūžinājusi unikālus kadrus ar retiem dzīvniekiem, kādus nereti nav iespējams sastapt nekur citur. Dokumentālās filmu sērijas veidotāji stājās pretī ekstremāliem laikapstākļiem, izsalkušiem plēsējiem, vētrainām jūrām, stāviem kalniem un saules svelmei, lai atklātu mežonīgās un nepieradināmās Patagonijas dabas dārgumus.

programme.title: Pārkāpumi sportā
programme.desc: Ieskats profesionālā sporta sarežģītajā pasaulē. Intervijas, arhīvu materiāli un pētnieciski ziņojumi atklās skandālu, sāncensības un slavas psiholoģisko ietekmi uz sportistiem un komandām.

programme.title: Nezināmā robeža ar Džimiju Činu
programme.desc: Profesionālā kalnos kāpēja Džimija Čina komforta zona ir rāpšanās pa klinšu sienu tūkstošiem metru virs zemes. Dabas varenība Džimiju vilina un nebeidz pārsteigt, tomēr viņš labi apzinās, cik svarīgi ir cienīt un respektēt to. Raidījumā dokumentēti pasaules labāko ekstrēmo sportistu negadījumi un kļūmes, neapdomīgi pārvērtējot savu spēju robežas dabas priekšā. Sportisti atklās dramatiskus, pat šausminošus stāstus par izšķirošiem incidentiem, kas vienā mirklī varēja izbeigt viņu dzīvi. Kalnu snovbordists, kas iekļuvis lavīnā, smaiļotājs, kas iesprostots zem ūdenskrituma – sērijas atklās, kā šie mirkļi mainījuši sportistu dzīvi un iemeslus, kādēļ tie atgriežas kalna korē vai atkal iekāpj kajakā.

programme.title: Pārkāpumi sportā
programme.desc: Ieskats profesionālā sporta sarežģītajā pasaulē. Intervijas, arhīvu materiāli un pētnieciski ziņojumi atklās skandālu, sāncensības un slavas psiholoģisko ietekmi uz sportistiem un komandām.

programme.title: Noliktava nr.13 4
programme.desc: Dienviddakotā valdība glabā vairāku gadsimtu gaitā apkopotas pārdabiskas lietas. Aģentu uzdevums ir atgūt pazudušos objektus un izmeklēt pārdabiskus notikumus. Seriāla trešajā sezonā komandai pievienosies jauns biedrs, kam piemīt neparasta spēja atklāt melus. Tiks izmeklēti arvien jauni noslēpumi, izdarīti nopietni atklājumi par Noliktavas tumšo pusi, un vēl ieradīsies daži pazīstami personāži.

programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 17
programme.desc: Pavisam “parasto” Grifinu ģimeni no izdomātās Rodailendas pilsētiņas droši var raksturot kā neaudzinātu, izlutinātu un absolūti nekorektu. Pītera un Luisas Grifinu jaunākais bērns ir inteliģents, sadistisks mazulis, kurš pastāvīgi meklē savu māti un kaļ plānus par pasaules pārņemšanu. Dēlam Krisam ir tikpat zems intelekta līmenis kā viņa tēvam, meita Mega veltīgi cenšas sadraudzēties ar “foršajiem cilvēkiem”, taču vienmēr tiek atstumta. Tikmēr runājošais un martīni malkojošais ģimenes suns Braiens ir vienīgais, kam ir kaut kripatiņa saprāta.

programme.title: Pamestie superprojekti 7
programme.desc: Grandiozas milzu būves un konstrukcijas nu ir visu aizmirstas, apsūnojušas un sarūsējušas. Kā baismīgi rēgi tās atgādina par aizgājušo gadu nepiepildītajiem sapņiem un atstāj iespaidu ne tikai uz ainavu, bet arī vidi. Debesskrāpis Honkongā, grandioza pils Irākā, sacīkšu trase ASV... Kādēļ šo būvju celtniecība tikusi pamesta novārtā?

programme.title: Stīva Ostina lauzto kaulu izaicinājums 3
programme.desc: Slavenais aktieris un atlēts Stīvs Ostins atkal meklē Amerikas spēcīgākos, izturīgākos, sīkstākos un skarbākos vīrus un sievas. Katrā raidījumā astoņi sportisti un spēka mitriķi ierodas Stīva Ostina rančo, kur sacenšas fiziski un emocionāli smagos pārbaudījumos cits pret citu pēc izslēgšanas metodes – pēc katra pārbaudījuma cīņu turpina tikai uzvarētāji, līdz finālā tiek noskaidrots vislabākais. Lai uzvarētu šajos pārbaudījumos – nepietiks tikai ar fizisku spēku un izturību, noderēs arī apņēmība, drosme, prasmes, prāts, attapība, reakcija, mentāla noturība un īpašas tehnikas.

programme.title: Stīva Ostina lauzto kaulu izaicinājums 3
programme.desc: Slavenais aktieris un atlēts Stīvs Ostins atkal meklē Amerikas spēcīgākos, izturīgākos, sīkstākos un skarbākos vīrus un sievas. Katrā raidījumā astoņi sportisti un spēka mitriķi ierodas Stīva Ostina rančo, kur sacenšas fiziski un emocionāli smagos pārbaudījumos cits pret citu pēc izslēgšanas metodes – pēc katra pārbaudījuma cīņu turpina tikai uzvarētāji, līdz finālā tiek noskaidrots vislabākais. Lai uzvarētu šajos pārbaudījumos – nepietiks tikai ar fizisku spēku un izturību, noderēs arī apņēmība, drosme, prasmes, prāts, attapība, reakcija, mentāla noturība un īpašas tehnikas.

programme.title: Lauku sēta 2
programme.desc: Šovs Lauku sēta norisinās Beverīnas novadā – Rozītēs. Tur saimnieko atraktīva, strādīga un pēc kārtīgiem strādniekiem izslāpusi saimniece Valentīna Roziņa. Saimniece ir sieviete ar krampi, kura zina, kādam ir jābūt īstam darba darītājam, un ierādīs sliņķiem īsto vietu! Šī saimniece mēli aiz zobiem netur un pateiks, ja izdarītais darbs nebūs kvalitatīvs. Valentīnas pārvaldītajā saimniecībā dzīvo ap simts govis, kā arī teļi, cūkas un vistas. Skaidrs ir viens – te būs ko darīt! Dalībniekus sagaida kārtīgs lauku režīms – lai arī gulēt gājuši pavēlu, dalībnieki dabūs celties ļoti agri, jo vasara ir laiks kad jāpaspēj izdarīt maksimums. Lauku sētas dalībnieku viens no lielākajiem izaicinājumiem būs tieši celšanās agrajos rītos, lai dotos uz kūti. Tajā būs jātīra mēsli, jāslauc govis, jābaro lopiņi – šķiet, kas tad tur tāds? Taču ne katram tas ir pa spēkam! Protams, te neizpaliks arī menģēšanās dalībnieku starpā – kašķi, strīdi, aprunāšana. Tā teikt – latvietis latvietim gardākais ēdiens. Runājot par ēdienu – būt nedēļas pavāra godā – tas būs izaicinājums katram Lauku sētas dalībniekam. Olu uzcept jau māk kurš katrs, bet desmit olas vienlaicīgi???

programme.title: Kobra 18
programme.desc: Šai laikā Semīrs nomainījis gan daudzus pāriniekus, gan dažus priekšniekus, bet nu jau pāris sezonas viņš strādā plecu pie pleca ar turīgu vecāku atvasi Benu. Abi it kā atšķirīgie vīri ir kļuvuši par labiem draugiem, kas pārinieka dēļ gatavi riskēt ar dzīvību un viens otru saprot no pusvārda. Pārinieki ir gatavi stāties pretim pat visbīstamākajiem noziedzniekiem, un viņiem palīdz nelokāmā policijas priekšniece Anna Engelharda, kas abus izmeklētājus aizstāv, kad viņi iekuļas nepatikšanās. Talkā nāk arī divi policisti Dīters un Horsts, kuri noziedzniekus vajā Porsche Cayenne automašīnā. Kad pakaļ dzenas vienības Kobra vīri, tālu aizmukt nav iespējams.

programme.title: Tāskmāsters 4
programme.desc: Joku šovs, kurā slaveni britu komiķi veic ārkārtīgi dīvainus uzdevumus un tāskmāsters Gregs Deiviss tos pienācīgi novērtē. Lieta tāda, ka Grega palīgs Alekss Horns ir apveltīts ne tikai ar bezgalīgu uzticību, bet arī dīvainībām pilnu prātu. Ceturtajā sezonā Alekss tāskmāstera uzdevumā izaicinās komiķus gan uzzīmēt karikatūru, pašu zīmējamo subjektu nemaz neredzot, gan noturēt basketbola bumbu uz skrejceliņa iespējami ilgāk, gan piedabūt trīs vistas vienlaicīgi atrasties uz neliela sarkana paklājiņa.

programme.title: Simpsoni 32
programme.desc: Kaut kur Amerikas vidū ir pilsēta vārdā Springfīlda. Šai gluži parastajā pilsētā dzīvo gluži parasta ģimene Simpsoni: papus Homērs, dumiķis, kas strādā kodolreaktorā; visnotaļ prātīgā mamma Mārdža, mājsaimniece; izcili gudrā un talantīgā mazā Liza; viņas brālis dauzoņa Bārts un mazā Megija. Lai gan ģimene šķiet visnotaļ ikdienišķa, viņu dzīve ir neparastiem notikumiem bagāta un skar mūs visus interesējošas tēmas – no attiecībām ģimenē līdz pat pilsētas un visas cilvēces nākotnei...

programme.title: Simpsoni 32
programme.desc: Kaut kur Amerikas vidū ir pilsēta vārdā Springfīlda. Šai gluži parastajā pilsētā dzīvo gluži parasta ģimene Simpsoni: papus Homērs, dumiķis, kas strādā kodolreaktorā; visnotaļ prātīgā mamma Mārdža, mājsaimniece; izcili gudrā un talantīgā mazā Liza; viņas brālis dauzoņa Bārts un mazā Megija. Lai gan ģimene šķiet visnotaļ ikdienišķa, viņu dzīve ir neparastiem notikumiem bagāta un skar mūs visus interesējošas tēmas – no attiecībām ģimenē līdz pat pilsētas un visas cilvēces nākotnei...

programme.title: Īpašo uzdevumu vienība Hawaii 5-0 10
programme.desc: Par „Hawaii 5-0” vienības veiklību vairs neviens nav jāpārliecina – no šīs komandas prasmīgā tvēriena nav izmucis gandrīz neviens noziedznieks – slepkavas, kontrabandisti, narkotiku tirgoņi, zagļi un artefaktu mednieki ar netīru sirdsapziņu. Seriāla desmitajā un noslēdzošajā sezonā Stīvs Makgarets kopā ar komandu turpinās izmeklēt dažādus noziegumus, kas pastrādāti kādā no Havaju salām, un galu galā uzveiks pretinieku, kurš visus savedis kopā.

programme.title: Austrālijas zelta meklētāji 2
programme.desc: Austrālijas vidiene ir mājvieta pārsteidzošiem un neparastiem savvaļas dzīvniekiem, taču zem tuksnešainā smiltāja slēpjas vēl kāds rets dārgums – zelts. Trīs zelta drudža pārņemtas komandas dodas šo dārgmetālu medībās, neļaujot tveicīgajam karstumam, čūskām vai krūmu ugunsgrēkiem tās apturēt. Lai sasniegtu sapni par bagātību, laimes meklētāji pat gatavi riskēt ar saviem ietaupījumiem. Šajā sezonā "Smilšu suņu" mērķis ir iespaidīgs – 11 kilogramu zelta. Kristīnei un Gregam vajag vismaz 1,2 kilogramus tīrradņu, lai paglābtos no izputēšanas. Ambiciozais pāris Lekija un Teds sapņo par 2 kilogramiem. Jaunpienācējs Riks cer kļūt par 567 gramiem zelta bagātāks. Bet Kellija un Harijs liks lietā visparastākos metāla detektorus, lai šosezon sasniegtu 1,7 kilogramu mērķi.

programme.title: Noliktavu kari 11
programme.desc: Ja Kalifornijas štatā, ASV, par mantu glabātuvi netiek maksāts trīs mēnešus, noliktavas īpašnieks tā saturu drīkst izpārdot izsolē. Šovs seko vairākiem šādu izsoļu dalībniekiem, kur ar to nodarbojas profesionāli. Pirms katras izsoles tiek atvērta mantu glabātuve, un potenciālie pircēji piecas minūtes var aplūkot to saturu, taču viņi nedrīkst iet iekšā, lai apskatītos tuvāk, vai glabātuvē esošajās mantās ir kas vērtīgs. Kad izsole ir galā, uzvarētājs izpēta, ko tieši ir iegādājies un ar ekspertu palīdzību nosaka katras lietas vērtību, lai saprastu – šis pirkums ir nesis peļņu vai zaudējumus un cik lielus.

programme.title: Virsotne. Jaunzēlande
programme.desc: Aizraujošas izturības sacīkstes, kur fiziskās un emocionālās robežas tiek pārbaudītas līdz lūzuma punktam. Piedzīvojumā dodas 14 svešinieki, kuriem ir viens mērķis – sasniegt kalna virsotni. Starp dalībniekiem vienādās daļās ir sadalīts miljons dolāru, ko katrs šai pārgājienā nes sev līdzi mugursomā. Grupai ir jāsasniedz attāla kalna virsotne tikai 14 dienās, lai iegūtu līdzi paņemto naudu. Pārgājiena laikā viņiem būs jāstrādā kā komandai, pārvarot bīstamu reljefu, skarbus laikapstākļus un adrenalīna pilnus izaicinājumus. Ja pārgājiena dalībnieks izstājas, jāatvadās arī no viņa mugursomā esošās naudas. Dalībniekiem laikus jāsasniedz virsotne, citādi naudas balva tiks zaudēta. Ceļā viņus gaida nežēlīgi pavērsieni – arī iespēja nozagt cita dalībnieka naudu. Vai viņi sasniegs virsotni laikā un kurš dosies prom ar naudu?

programme.title: Nakts skrējiens
programme.desc: Bruklinā pazīstams algotais slepkava Džimijs Konlons savulaik iemantojis iesauku Kapracis. Viņa labākais draugs ir nežēlīgais mafijas boss Šons Magvairs. Kad Džimija atsvešinātais dēls Maikls kļūst par slepkavas mērķi, viņš dara visu iespējamo, lai glābtu dēlu. Džimijs saskaras ar uzpērkamiem policistiem, algotiem slepkavām un gangsteriem, vienlaikus cenšoties neļaut Maiklam sekot savās pēdās. Tas notiek vienas bīstamas nakts laikā.

programme.title: Aklais detektīvs 4
programme.desc: Bijušais inspektors Hallers savā ceturtajā lietā ir liecinieks slepkavībai: kokaīns ar šķipsniņu kālija cianīda sāls ir nāvējošs maisījums. Aklais izmeklētājs palīdz Vīnes policijai noskaidrot, kurš saindējis baņķieri. Hallera deguns aizvedina viņu uz taksometru uzņēmumu, kas Vīnē piegādā kokaīnu, un Hallera šoferi Niko sagaida neparasts slepenais uzdevums: izspiegojot gudri maskētu narkotiku kurjeru ķēdi, viņam nākas nomainīt taksometru uz ormaņa karieti.

programme.title: Aklais detektīvs 5
programme.desc: Vainas apziņa un grēku izpirkšana kļūst par iemeslu slepkavībai – Aleksandrs Beijers uzņēmies soģa lomu, izaicinot aklā detektīva Hallera kriminālistiskās prasmes. 2017. gada 17. oktobris bija diena, kad mainījās bijušā komisāra Hallera dzīve: viņš bumbas sprādzienā zaudēja savu līgavu Karu un arī redzi. Kādas slepkavības lietā atklājas noslēpumaina norāde ar tieši šo datumu, un viņa pēctece Laura Janda lūdz Hallera palīdzību. Tomēr starp inspektori un viņas bijušo mentoru rodas spriedze, jo Hallers tic sazvērestībai, kuru nu beidzot vēlas atklāt. Policijas kartotēkā viņi uziet kādu pavedienu: dienā, kad notika uzbrukums Halleram, fiksēts vēl kāds nāves gadījums. Seksuālā noziegumā vainotais Brendners apcietinājumā atņēma sev dzīvību. Vai Brenders, kā Hallers joprojām ir stingri pārliecināts, patiešām bija vainīgs? Un kāds tam sakars ar pašreizējo slepkavību? Kopā ar labo roku Niko izmeklētājs atsāk šķetināt slēgto lietu.

programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 17
programme.desc: Pavisam “parasto” Grifinu ģimeni no izdomātās Rodailendas pilsētiņas droši var raksturot kā neaudzinātu, izlutinātu un absolūti nekorektu. Pītera un Luisas Grifinu jaunākais bērns ir inteliģents, sadistisks mazulis, kurš pastāvīgi meklē savu māti un kaļ plānus par pasaules pārņemšanu. Dēlam Krisam ir tikpat zems intelekta līmenis kā viņa tēvam, meita Mega veltīgi cenšas sadraudzēties ar “foršajiem cilvēkiem”, taču vienmēr tiek atstumta. Tikmēr runājošais un martīni malkojošais ģimenes suns Braiens ir vienīgais, kam ir kaut kripatiņa saprāta.

programme.title: Sporta notikumu tops
programme.desc: Iespaidīgi stāsti par nozīmīgākajiem mirkļiem un personībām sportā. Desmit neaizmirstamākās debijas, desmit vērtīgākie pionieri sportā, visu laiku lieliskākās atgriešanās un citi aizraujoši notikumi, kas atstājuši nospiedumu pasaules sporta vēstures lappusēs.

programme.title: Auschwitz - One Day
programme.desc: This documentary tells the story of a typical day in 1944 at the concentration camp of Auschwitz; it is based on a unique document which is kept in the Israeli memorial site of Yad Vashem.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: The greatest 20th-century commanders understood warfare at both strategic and tactical level; some instilled loyalty in their troops through fear and intimidation while others inspired confidence.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: The Spanish island of Villa Winter was suspected of being a port for German U-boats and part of a larger plan to invade the United States.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: We look at the Nazi hegemony from 1941 to its decline in 1945; deciphered archives show us the greatest offensive of the 20th century in the East as well as the apocalypse of a ruined Germany.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: Was Adolf Hitler a master of war or a maker of war? His obsessive quest for territorial domination led to early triumphs, but his refusal to listen to his generals led to catastrophic failures.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.sub-title: Don explores newly-discovered ruins and caves in Croatia as he uncovers the true story of a formidable queen who dared to defy the powerful Roman Empire.
programme.desc: Don Wildman attempt to shine new light on the most vexing mysteries of our past and delves deep as he journeys to the ends of the Earth travelling to historys most ancient places.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: Part of the Nazi plan was to take control of most of Europes vast collection of artworks, treasures, and gold; the Nazis hid this massive loot down within mine shafts in Austria and Germany.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The Grimaldi family has held their posts as sovereigns of Monaco with the utmost grace, but one thing they have missed time and again is good luck in the love department.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The location of King Solomons Mines has been a mystery for hundreds of years; new evidence has led to an amazing discovery. Might Solomons wealth have come from the copper mines of southern Israel?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: Could strange objects found inside the Great Pyramid at Giza be a toolkit, and is it true that a terracotta sculpture is evidence that Romans got to the Americas long before Columbus?
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable objects on Earth; using new research and technology, we get under their skin like never before.

programme.title: Revolutions That Changed History
programme.sub-title: Celtic Queen Boudica led a fierce rebellion against Roman oppression after her tribes mistreatment; destroying major cities, she nearly defeated Rome but secured her legacy in a devastating final clash.
programme.desc: This series exposes the truth behind ancient revolutions and revolts, from action-packed bloody battlegrounds to the intimate exchanges between confidants that were powerful enough to turn tides.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.sub-title: Don explores newly-discovered ruins and caves in Croatia as he uncovers the true story of a formidable queen who dared to defy the powerful Roman Empire.
programme.desc: Don Wildman attempt to shine new light on the most vexing mysteries of our past and delves deep as he journeys to the ends of the Earth travelling to historys most ancient places.

programme.title: Myths: Great Mysteries of Humanity
programme.sub-title: Dragons have been an integral part of culture and history for centuries - sometimes as fire-breathing monsters, other times as healing spirits - but what is the truth behind the legends?
programme.desc: Myths: how much truth lies behind them? This series takes a look at some of the speculations surrounding myths, explores outlandish theories, and puts the science behind these myths to the test.

programme.title: The World War: 1914-1945
programme.sub-title: Hitler and Stalin begin to shape the course of history. President Roosevelt attempts to raise his country out of the Depression, and the world teeters on the brink of yet another World War.
programme.desc: A series that views the most violent and significant episodes in modern history from a fresh perspective - not as two world wars, but as a continuous narrative of error, ambition, and courage.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: The key machine in the Blitzkrieg was the GM Opel Blitz; this episode tells the story of the Blitz and the American-owned war factories that would produce them and put business before country.
programme.desc: No matter how many soldiers you have, how clever your generals or how daring your strategy, you will not win a war if you dont have enough bullets, planes, or food. WW2 was a war of the factories...

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: Researchers discovered a concrete city buried outside The Hague decades after WWII; more than 400 bunkers and defensive structures formed a vast underground network built to defend the coastline.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.sub-title: Celtic Queen Boudica led a fierce rebellion against Roman oppression after her tribes mistreatment; destroying major cities, she nearly defeated Rome but secured her legacy in a devastating final clash.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: Was Adolf Hitler a master of war or a maker of war? His obsessive quest for territorial domination led to early triumphs, but his refusal to listen to his generals led to catastrophic failures.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: We look at the Nazi hegemony from 1941 to its decline in 1945; deciphered archives show us the greatest offensive of the 20th century in the East as well as the apocalypse of a ruined Germany.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: Auschwitz: The Inside Man
programme.desc: As a witness to some of the darkest chapters of human history, Polish officer Witold Pilecki was the first man to inform the Allies about the reality of the Holocaust from inside Auschwitz.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: What defines a successful fighting force? Warfare has changed radically over the last century, and armed forces have had to adapt to new technologies and tactics.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: Kraftwerk Nord West was one of the largest Nazi bunkers ever; constructed outside of the French town of Watten, it was a missile facility with storage for 108 missiles and two launch pads.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: Ancient Superstructures
programme.sub-title: In the heart of the Peruvian Andes, the city of Machu Picchu remains the Incas most breathtaking and enigmatic urban creation; today, experts investigate areas that were previously unknown.
programme.desc: We delve into the engineering mysteries behind the worlds most famous ancient structures by observing them from perspectives ranging from satellite imagery right down to macro and microscopic levels.

programme.title: Ancient Superstructures
programme.sub-title: The Mayan city of Chichen Itza was the capital of a powerful civilisation - the water wizards of the Itzas - but was mysteriously abandoned between the 11th and 13th centuries.
programme.desc: We delve into the engineering mysteries behind the worlds most famous ancient structures by observing them from perspectives ranging from satellite imagery right down to macro and microscopic levels.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.sub-title: Don Wildman explores deep below ancient ruins as he searches for clues pointing to the true fate of the once-mighty Mayan empire.
programme.desc: Don Wildman attempt to shine new light on the most vexing mysteries of our past and delves deep as he journeys to the ends of the Earth travelling to historys most ancient places.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The Lost Japanese Treasure is thought to have been buried under the Philippines by retreating Japanese forces at the end of WWII; it is said to include relics, artwork, and gold melted down into bars.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The Habsburgs were the most powerful family in Europe for centuries; why was their destiny so fatal, and were all their tribulations connected to some kind of curse?
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: One of the richest men on Earth, Aristotle Onassis left a string of broken hearts in his wake, but no romance would catapult him into the limelight like his marriage to Jacqueline Kennedy.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: A team of experts investigate the methods Hitler used to indoctrinate Germany, turning it into a finely-tuned war machine; we visit Goebbels Propaganda Ministry and the holiday park of Prora.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: Why does a 9,000-year-old clay head contain a real skull, can a strange machine built in the 50s really control the weather, and did an archaeologist really stumble on the oldest map of the world?
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable objects on Earth; using new research and technology, we get under their skin like never before.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: Was Adolf Hitler a master of war or a maker of war? His obsessive quest for territorial domination led to early triumphs, but his refusal to listen to his generals led to catastrophic failures.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.sub-title: Don Wildman explores deep below ancient ruins as he searches for clues pointing to the true fate of the once-mighty Mayan empire.
programme.desc: Don Wildman attempt to shine new light on the most vexing mysteries of our past and delves deep as he journeys to the ends of the Earth travelling to historys most ancient places.

programme.title: Myths: Great Mysteries of Humanity
programme.sub-title: Witches - child-eating monsters in service of the devil? Age-old stories and archaeological discoveries reveal magical practices and describe both alluring and terrifying women with special powers.
programme.desc: Myths: how much truth lies behind them? This series takes a look at some of the speculations surrounding myths, explores outlandish theories, and puts the science behind these myths to the test.

programme.title: The World War: 1914-1945
programme.sub-title: Hitlers invasion of the Rhineland was a gamble that paid off as his push west remained unchecked; while the leaders of Europe attempt peace, Kristallnacht signalled the horrors yet to come to many.
programme.desc: A series that views the most violent and significant episodes in modern history from a fresh perspective - not as two world wars, but as a continuous narrative of error, ambition, and courage.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: March 1915: a unit of 90 German infantrymen are armed with two MGo8 Maxim-style machine guns. In just 90 minutes, they inflict 1,000 casualties upon advancing British infantry.
programme.desc: No matter how many soldiers you have, how clever your generals or how daring your strategy, you will not win a war if you dont have enough bullets, planes, or food. WW2 was a war of the factories...

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases

programme.title: Resistance: They Fought Back
programme.desc: Most people have no idea how widespread Jewish resistance to Nazi barbarism was; this documentary illustrating the uprising in ghettos, rebellions in death camps, and armed resistance in the forests.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: The Mark 1 tank was first used in 1916 to give the Allies an advantage in the trenches; it changed how battles were fought and became the foundation of a century of innovation in armoured vehicles.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: As the Red Army approached a forest in Poland toward the end of the war, they stumbled upon a complex containing more than 1,000 structures across 25 square kilometres.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years, and a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr Jamess dad brings in Lucy, a wounded mangrove monitor lizard, Dr Kiara treats a wild echidna, and Dr Hamish must uncover the cause of Bernoulli the Alexandrine parrots behaviour changes.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: To reach adulthood, animals must constantly overcome many obstacles; from mantids to scimitar-horned oryx, some animals have adapted in surprising ways to ensure they make it to old age unscathed.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian rushes over to see worried cow farmer Joe, Peter heads to Richards farm - where a sheeps life is in danger - and at the Huddersfield hospital, Brandy the German Shepherd is lame and in pain.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peters under extra pressure with Charlie the horse - he belongs to his niece Jess; when Julian sees Jackie Barlow, its usually about one of her alpacas, but today the patient is her little dog Isla.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt arrives in eastern Zambia to film three packs of wild dogs - the Manzis, Kakulis and Stork Colony - in three very different territories.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter removes an oven glove from terrier Wesleys stomach and an optometrist spots a problem with his daughters pet rabbit Patch; Julian makes the difficult decision to remove an eye.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: A special episode focusing on births and babies; Julian heads to a local farm where a cow is struggling in labour, and baby goat Daisy has serious eye problems that are affecting her sight.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian rushes to a dramatic emergency at Jackie Barlows alpaca farm; with things returning to normal post-Covid, Peter returns to the Greens farm, where theres now lots of veterinary work to do.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter rushes into Skeldale on his day off to try to save a lamb of Richard Bells, and Julians treating a very poorly one-week old llama called Noah at Suzanne Bensons trekking centre.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Brotherhood of Lions
programme.sub-title: Hunger drives the cubs to violence and family relationships are complicated; the lions rely on the more agile lionesses for hunting and face challenges such as climate change.
programme.desc: This series tells the compelling and immersive story of the daily life of young lions and their challenges while growing up; it also showcases the struggles and triumphs of the lions.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.sub-title: Australia is a land cast adrift since the time of the dinosaurs; isolated for millions of years, evolution has transformed its animals into the most impressive gladiators on the planet.
programme.desc: There are animals born to fight and destined to face their foe across the planet; armed with weaponry, guile and tactics, these gladiators are prepared for battle. Only champions will reign supreme...

programme.title: Wild Battleground
programme.sub-title: Cold hearts beat with a raging hot fury in a frozen world of snow, icy waters and extreme wind chill; from snow leopards to polar bears, these fighters battle it out with each other.
programme.desc: We show how animals use their unique attributes to defeat their opponents; they have honed their skills for millennia and have become masters of communication, camouflage, diplomacy and combat.

programme.title: Wild Fighters
programme.sub-title: We often witness combats of all kinds in the animal kingdom - from hand-to-hand fighting to fierce fashion shows and extravagant tournaments - but what is behind all these wild competitions?
programme.desc: Animals fight to ensure their survival, but what are the reasons that make them risk their lives every day, and what are the consequences of winning or losing these battles?

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: Bull sharks are the most aggressive and unpredictable of all the sharks; Jeremy travels to this river to see if last years catch was a one-off or if there are more monsters out there.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Hot Life: Africa
programme.sub-title: The caracal always lives where the land and vegetation are the same colour; it is stealthy and silent, a perfect master of camouflage and also a specialist in deserts and savannahs.
programme.desc: The threat of climate change is above all a risk for those who live in hot regions of the world like Africa; will its incredible living beings be able to resist a little longer?

programme.title: Raptors
programme.sub-title: An extraordinary look at the extreme ways in which birds of prey conquer the toughest habitats on Earth ny taking on deadly prey; raptors have solutions to many very extreme challenges.
programme.desc: Birds of prey are our planets greatest hunters; united by a hooked beak, a taste for flesh and razor-sharp talons, they have conquered the globe. This is the story of raptors unparalleled success...

programme.title: Europes Wilderness
programme.sub-title: A look at the capercaillie, biologists capture wild animals in central Sweden and take them to Germany, and black grouse are reintroduced in the Nature Park Niederlausitz.
programme.desc: We present six of the largest, rarest and fastest animals in Europe; how does climate change affect them, and how do they defend their habitat against human influence?

programme.title: Europes Wilderness
programme.sub-title: This episode look at the golden jackal, a shy predator whose territory used to be the Balkan and further southern regions; now they are spreading north, and scientists are trying to find out why.
programme.desc: We present six of the largest, rarest and fastest animals in Europe; how does climate change affect them, and how do they defend their habitat against human influence?

programme.title: Scotland: A Wild Year
programme.sub-title: As spring brings warmer weather and longer days, its the breeding season across Scotland; we follow mountain hares, emperor moths and the capercaillie, the worlds biggest grouse.
programme.desc: We visit Scotlands secret wild places and the unexpected animals that live there; filmed over four dramatic seasons, these are the extraordinary stories of Scotlands spectacular iconic wildlife.

programme.title: Scotland: A Wild Year
programme.sub-title: Summer has arrived in Scotland, bringing long days and an abundance of food; we join white-tailed eaglets, deer, squirrels, otters, beavers and gannets at the countrys many coastal spots and lochs.
programme.desc: We visit Scotlands secret wild places and the unexpected animals that live there; filmed over four dramatic seasons, these are the extraordinary stories of Scotlands spectacular iconic wildlife.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: The team prepares to release two beautiful and elusive spotted cats called servals - meanwhile, its all hands on deck when a baby monkey arrives in critical condition.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James performs surgery on a tiny zebra finch; Dr Lucinda attends to Froggie, the green tree frog who is actually blue; Dr Shane treats a Macquarie turtle whose abscess has burst through its shell.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: Many animals can be found in the forests and jungles. From Snares penguins in New Zealand to leaf-tailed geckos and fossas in Madagascar, a vast array of species have made their home among the trees.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its 100 degrees and rising; as waterholes dry up, Julz is alarmed to find lions in the Kakuli packs favourite drinking spot but also gets to touch a wild dog for the first time ever.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: The team prepares to release two beautiful and elusive spotted cats called servals - meanwhile, its all hands on deck when a baby monkey arrives in critical condition.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James performs surgery on a tiny zebra finch; Dr Lucinda attends to Froggie, the green tree frog who is actually blue; Dr Shane treats a Macquarie turtle whose abscess has burst through its shell.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: To reach adulthood, animals must constantly overcome many obstacles; from mantids to scimitar-horned oryx, some animals have adapted in surprising ways to ensure they make it to old age unscathed.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups as they face off with a warthog, and Thandie Mweetwa - ZCPs lion specialist - counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian races to an emergency at a local farm where a cow is unable to stand up, and Peter tries to save three-week-old Sphynx kitten Dobby; his tiny patient has pneumonia.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Europes Wilderness
programme.sub-title: A look at the capercaillie, biologists capture wild animals in central Sweden and take them to Germany, and black grouse are reintroduced in the Nature Park Niederlausitz.
programme.desc: We present six of the largest, rarest and fastest animals in Europe; how does climate change affect them, and how do they defend their habitat against human influence?

programme.title: Europes Wilderness
programme.sub-title: This episode look at the golden jackal, a shy predator whose territory used to be the Balkan and further southern regions; now they are spreading north, and scientists are trying to find out why.
programme.desc: We present six of the largest, rarest and fastest animals in Europe; how does climate change affect them, and how do they defend their habitat against human influence?

programme.title: Scotland: A Wild Year
programme.sub-title: As spring brings warmer weather and longer days, its the breeding season across Scotland; we follow mountain hares, emperor moths and the capercaillie, the worlds biggest grouse.
programme.desc: We visit Scotlands secret wild places and the unexpected animals that live there; filmed over four dramatic seasons, these are the extraordinary stories of Scotlands spectacular iconic wildlife.

programme.title: Scotland: A Wild Year
programme.sub-title: Summer has arrived in Scotland, bringing long days and an abundance of food; we join white-tailed eaglets, deer, squirrels, otters, beavers and gannets at the countrys many coastal spots and lochs.
programme.desc: We visit Scotlands secret wild places and the unexpected animals that live there; filmed over four dramatic seasons, these are the extraordinary stories of Scotlands spectacular iconic wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Fighters
programme.sub-title: Family is everything; many species live in families, clans, or groups. The survival of each individual depends on the family, and the family depends on the union of all its components.
programme.desc: Animals fight to ensure their survival, but what are the reasons that make them risk their lives every day, and what are the consequences of winning or losing these battles?

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: Jeremy Wade normally travels deep into the globes most remote regions searching for freshwater monsters, but recently hes been getting reports of killers from an unexpected location - the USA.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Natures Fast Attacks
programme.sub-title: This first episode features footage showing the lightning-fast moves that predators deploy to capture their prey and the rapid escape tactics that will see who wins these high-velocity battles.
programme.desc: In this two-part documentary series, we see footage that captures the lightning-fast moves used to ambush prey and make equally rapid escapes in the terrifying moments between life and death.

programme.title: Brotherhood of Lions
programme.sub-title: Oloborr emerges as the leader of a pride which mainly relies on buffalo for food; as it faces obstacles in establishing dominance, tensions arise within the group.
programme.desc: This series tells the compelling and immersive story of the daily life of young lions and their challenges while growing up; it also showcases the struggles and triumphs of the lions.

programme.title: A Game of Leopard Thrones
programme.sub-title: An old leopard queen is dead; when Thandi, the new queen, discovers the young cubs left behind, the fight for survival and for the crown of Djuma is on.
programme.desc: The queen of the leopard royal family of the Djuma Private Game Reserve in the Sabi Sands of South Africa has passed on - who will be crowned as the next leopard king and queen?

programme.title: Wild Boar: The Comeback
programme.desc: Hunted, slaughtered and exterminated - that was the wild boars fate throughout the last century. This is the story of the most underrated animal in Europes forests and its remarkable comeback.

programme.title: Fateful Planet
programme.sub-title: Around 540 million years ago, plate tectonics and climatic fluctuations kept throwing new life off track; evolution nevertheless progressed and even managed to make the leap onto land.
programme.desc: Our planet is marked by catastrophes whether collisions in the solar system, asteroid strikes, volcanic eruptions or global climatic crises; this series reconstructs some of these historic catastrophes.

programme.title: Fateful Planet
programme.sub-title: The dinosaurs dominated our planet for over 150 million years, but the dinosaurs vanished together with 75% of all species when the last mass extinction struck 66 million years ago.
programme.desc: Our planet is marked by catastrophes whether collisions in the solar system, asteroid strikes, volcanic eruptions or global climatic crises; this series reconstructs some of these historic catastrophes.
